__e: Today, the Emperor is dead instead of me.
Your Grace, the Emperor is not delighted that there remains within your realm...
Every Senator will understand their meaning and vote the way he believes his Emperor wants him to.
Yet let me be their bail, for by my father's reverend tomb I vow they shall be ready at Your Highness' will to answer their suspicion with their lives.
- Simon says hands on your knees.
Simon says hands on your head.
Simon says tug at your ear.
The kaiser's got everything he needs.
I do not know where the emperor has sent him.
But the emperor has never seen me.
I have received letters from great Rome which signify what hate they bear their emperor and how desirous of our sight they are.
What has become clear to both the Emperor and myself is that, if we were to lose Paris, we would lose everything.
Give them to the Emperor. Tell him I will never forget the things he wrote.
When the emperor of China ceases to be an unbeliever, and accepts me, the Expected One, as the true Mahdi, then I shall be happy to receive such a gift.
Years ago, I led the armies of the emperor of China at a time of great trial.
But the Emperor of China had 1,000 ofthem.
